text: Norman Paul Cotton (February 26, 1943August 1, 2021) was an American guitarist and country rock singer-songwriter. He was a member of the band Poco. He wrote the international hit song "Heart of the Night". He was co-guitarist for the Illinois Speed Press. Cotton was born at Fort Rucker in Dale County, Alabama. Cotton died at his summer home near Eugene, Oregon on August 1, 2021, at the age of 78. ==Solo discography== * 1990 Changing Horses (Curb) * 2001 Firebird * 2004 When the Coast Is Clear * 2007 Sunset Kidd * 2014 100% Paul Cotton ==References== ==Other websites== *Paul Cotton Website Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American rock guitarists Category:American country guitarists Category:American rock singers Category:American country singers Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Writers from Alabama Category:Singers from Alabama
